definition: memorial tablet in a temple commemorating a deceased father

sentences.english: Each day I live, the grace you give.
sentences.chinese: 每天的生活，祢都赐下恩典。

sentences.english: God, you know, I just can't see beyond the door.
sentences.chinese: 神，祢知道，门外我就看不透了。

sentences.english: “If I have found grace in thy sight, show me thy glory”(Exod.33:13)
sentences.chinese: 我如今若在祢眼前蒙恩，求祢将祢的道指示我。

sentences.english: “If I have found grace in thy sight, show me thy glory”(Exod.33:13)
sentences.chinese: 我如今若在祢眼前蒙恩，求祢将祢的道指示我。

sentences.english: “If I have found grace in thy sight, show me thy glory”(Exod.33:13)
sentences.chinese: 我如今若在祢眼前蒙恩，求祢将祢的道指示我。

sentences.english: Rule in our hearts for ever, thou lovely Prince of Peace.
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的和平之君，愿祢永远统治我心。

sentences.english: Ichoate time , I Actually foolish foolish go believe you.
sentences.chinese: 刚开始的时候，我居然儍傻去相信祢。

sentences.english: Loving God, we desire to be faithful.
sentences.chinese: 慈爱的神，我们渴望忠心于祢。

sentences.english: Thou changest not, Thy compassions, they fail not.
sentences.chinese: 祢不改变，祢慈爱永不转移。

sentences.english: Thou changest not, Thy compassions, they fail not.
sentences.chinese: 祢不改变，祢慈爱永不转移。

sentences.english: Our Father, which art in heaven, hallowed be Thy name.
sentences.chinese: 哦，天父，天上的真神，愿尊祢名为圣。

sentences.english: Help us grow into the likeness of Jesus, who loves you perfectly.
sentences.chinese: 求祢使我们愈来愈像耶稣，那样完全地爱祢。

sentences.english: Help us grow into the likeness of Jesus, who loves you perfectly.
sentences.chinese: 求祢使我们愈来愈像耶稣，那样完全地爱祢。

sentences.english: From God our heavenly Father a blessed angel came.
sentences.chinese: 哦，天父，天上的真神，愿尊祢名为圣。

sentences.english: Our dear hero, please revive Your maidservants with the nectar of Your lips.
sentences.chinese: 我们亲爱的英雄，请用祢嘴唇的甘露令祢的女仆复活。

sentences.english: Our dear hero, please revive Your maidservants with the nectar of Your lips.
sentences.chinese: 我们亲爱的英雄，请用祢嘴唇的甘露令祢的女仆复活。

definition: (third person pronoun for a divine being)
Abba (Aramaic word father)/by ext. God the Father in Christian gospel
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
God (in Catholicism)/abbr. for 天主教[Tian1 zhu3 jiao4], Catholicism
